simts

Select the best model

Retrieves the best model

best_model(x, ic = "aic")

Arguments

x

An object from either select_arima, select_arma, select_ar, or select_ma.
ic

Type of criterion to use in selecting the best model.

Examples

sunspot = gts(sunspot.year, start = 1700, freq = 1)
sunspot_select = select_ar(sunspot, p.min = 1, p.max = 12)
#> Error in select_ar(sunspot, p.min = 1, p.max = 12): could not find function "select_ar"
sunspot_bm = best_model(sunspot_select, ic = "bic")
#> Error in best_model(sunspot_select, ic = "bic"): could not find function "best_model"
sunspot_bm
#> 
#> Call:
#> arima(x = xt, order = c(9, 0, 0), include.mean = include.mean)
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>          ar1      ar2      ar3     ar4      ar5     ar6     ar7      ar8
#>       1.1851  -0.4197  -0.1672  0.1823  -0.1326  0.0458  0.0067  -0.0287
#> s.e.  0.0579   0.0911   0.0944  0.0948   0.0955  0.0961  0.0962   0.0925
#>          ar9  intercept
#>       0.2218    49.7655
#> s.e.  0.0588     7.7354
#> 
#> sigma^2 estimated as 221.9:  log likelihood = -1192.74,  aic = 2407.48
